EmailTemplate.description: template for closing cases sent to the SFDC box
EmailTemplate.name: SFDC Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce Support - Resolution Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This is to let you know that your email: {!Case.Subject}, has been resolved based on the following information: {!Case.Close_Resolution__c}.
If you have further questions, or feel that the issue is not resolved, please provide the Case number or forward a copy of your initial request.
Please do not respond to this email. If you have a question, please send a new email to salesforce.administration@ncr.com.
Thank you,
The Salesforce Admin Team
